author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: World celebrates Easter despite lockdown
description: Across the globe, people are finding innovative ways to celebrate the Christian festival.
content:
Christians around the world are experimenting with new ways to spend Easter, as many countries remain under lockdown to limit the spread of coronavirus.
